attributes.action: Parliament will be found to be in contempt of the people.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament to be held to account by the people for not upholding the result of the Brexit Referendum held in 2018 when there was over 1 million majority to leave the EU
attributes.background: Parliament found Ministers in contempt of Parliament over not giving in full the Brexit advice given to them by the Attorney General on 4th Dec. 2018. What's good for the goose is good for the gander.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
